## Initialisation

```{r}
library(DetectImports)
library(ape)
set.seed(0)
```

# Simuation with constant population size 

```{r}
Ne1=function(t){return(10)}
tree1=simCoal(seq(2000,2020,0.1),Ne1)
plotBoth(tree1,Ne1)
```

# Simuation with varying population size

```{r}
Ne2=function(t){return(sin(t)+1.1)}
tree2=simCoal(seq(2000,2020,0.1),Ne2)
plotBoth(tree2,Ne2)
```
